sentences.english: The monkey opera, called "a local wonder", in Xinye county has a history of more than one thousand years long.
sentences.chinese: 有着一千多年曆史的新野猴戲，被稱爲“民間一絕”。

sentences.english: A monkey show can always be seen in the parks of Hefei!
sentences.chinese: 在合肥的公園裏到處可見這樣的“猴戲”場面。

definition: a kind of traditional Chinese sword-play
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom)/fig. all kinds of emotions/to mock and scold/(of writing) freely roving/following the author's fancy
to serve as a model for others (idiom)/to be a worthy teacher
to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)
to present a treasure/to offer a valuable piece of advice/to show off what one treasures
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
